get.summary: Allows you to retrieve the full chart of accounts

parameters.name: If-Modified-Since
parameters.description: Only records created or modified since this timestamp will be returned

parameters.name: where
parameters.description: Filter by an any element

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Order by an any element

200.description: Success - return response of type Accounts array with 0 to n Account

application/json.example: { "Accounts": [{ "AccountID": "ebd06280-af70-4bed-97c6-7451a454ad85", "Code": "091", "Name": "Business Savings Account", "Type": "BANK", "TaxType": "NONE", "EnablePaymentsToAccount": false, "BankAccountNumber": "0209087654321050", "BankAccountType": "BANK", "CurrencyCode": "NZD" },{ "AccountID": "7d05a53d-613d-4eb2-a2fc-dcb6adb80b80", "Code": "200", "Name": "Sales", "Type": "REVENUE", "TaxType": "OUTPUT2", "Description": "Income from any normal business activity", "EnablePaymentsToAccount": false }] }

put.summary: Allows you to create a new chart of accounts

200.description: Success - created new Account and return response of type Accounts array with new Account

400.description: Validation Error - some data was incorrect returns response of type Error

application/json.example: { "ErrorNumber": 10, "Type": "ValidationException", "Message": "A validation exception occurred", "Elements": [ { "AccountID": "00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000", "Code": "123456", "Name": "Foobar", "Type": "EXPENSE", "Description": "Hello World", "ValidationErrors": [ { "Message": "Please enter a unique Name." } ] } ] }

requestBody.description: Request of type Account

get.summary: Allows you to retrieve a single chart of accounts

parameters.name: AccountID
parameters.description: Unique identifier for retrieving single object

200.description: Success - return response of type Accounts array with one Account

post.summary: Allows you to update a chart of accounts

parameters.name: AccountID
parameters.description: Unique identifier for retrieving single object

200.description: Success - update existing Account and return response of type Accounts array with updated Account

application/json.example: { "Id": "9012e75c-ec08-40a9-ae15-153fc1f35c4d", "Status": "OK", "ProviderName": "Xero API Partner", "DateTimeUTC": "\/Date(1550795389340)\/", "Accounts": [ { "AccountID": "99ce6032-0678-4aa0-8148-240c75fee33a", "Code": "654321", "Name": "BarFoo", "Status": "ACTIVE", "Type": "EXPENSE", "TaxType": "INPUT", "Description": "Good Bye World", "Class": "EXPENSE", "EnablePaymentsToAccount": false, "ShowInExpenseClaims": false, "ReportingCode": "EXP", "ReportingCodeName": "Expense", "UpdatedDateUTC": "\/Date(1550795389333+0000)\/" } ] }

400.description: Validation Error - some data was incorrect returns response of type Error

application/json.example: { "ErrorNumber": 10, "Type": "ValidationException", "Message": "A validation exception occurred", "Elements": [ { "AccountID": "00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000", "Code": "123456", "Name": "Foobar", "Type": "EXPENSE", "Description": "Hello World", "ValidationErrors": [ { "Message": "Please enter a unique Name." } ] } ] }

requestBody.description: Request of type Accounts array with one Account

delete.summary: Allows you to delete a chart of accounts

parameters.name: AccountID

200.description: Success - delete existing Account and return response of type Accounts array with deleted Account

400.description: Validation Error - some data was incorrect returns response of type Error

application/json.example: { "ErrorNumber": 10, "Type": "ValidationException", "Message": "A validation exception occurred", "Elements": [ { "AccountID": "00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000", "Code": "123456", "Name": "Foobar", "Type": "EXPENSE", "Description": "Hello World", "ValidationErrors": [ { "Message": "Please enter a unique Name." } ] } ] }

/BatchPayments.description: Batch payments allow you to bundle multiple bills or invoices into one payment transaction. This means a single payment in Xero can be reconciled with a single transaction on the bank statement making for a much simpler bank reconciliation experience.

get.summary: Retrieve either one or many BatchPayments for invoices

parameters.name: If-Modified-Since
parameters.description: Only records created or modified since this timestamp will be returned

parameters.name: where
parameters.description: Filter by an any element

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Order by an any element

get.summary: Retrieve linked transactions (billable expenses)

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Up to 100 linked transactions will be returned in a single API call. Use the page parameter to specify the page to be returned e.g. page=1.

parameters.name: LinkedTransactionID
parameters.description: The Xero identifier for an Linked Transaction

parameters.name: SourceTransactionID
parameters.description: Filter by the SourceTransactionID. Get all the linked transactions created from a particular ACCPAY invoice

parameters.name: ContactID
parameters.description: Filter by the ContactID. Get all the linked transactions that have been assigned to a particular customer.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description: Filter by the combination of ContactID and Status. Get all the linked transactions that have been assigned to a particular customer and have a particular status e.g. GET /LinkedTransactions?ContactID=4bb34b03-3378-4bb2-a0ed-6345abf3224e&Status=APPROVED.

parameters.name: TargetTransactionID
parameters.description: Filter by the TargetTransactionID. Get all the linked transactions allocated to a particular ACCREC invoice

200.description: Success - return response of type LinkedTransactions array with all LinkedTransaction

put.summary: Allows you to create linked transactions (billable expenses)

parameters.description: Only records created or modified since this timestamp will be returned

parameters.name: where
parameters.description: Filter by an any element

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Order by an any element

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: e.g. page=1 – Up to 100 manual journals will be returned in a single API call with line items shown for each overpayment

200.description: Success - return response of type ManualJournals array with a all ManualJournals

get.summary: Allows you to retrieve specified Attachment on ManualJournals

parameters.name: ManualJournalID

parameters.name: AttachmentID
parameters.description: Unique identifier for a Attachment

parameters.name: contentType
parameters.description: The mime type of the attachment file you are retrieving i.e image/jpg, application/pdf

get.summary: Allows you to retrieve specified Attachment on ManualJournal by file name

parameters.name: ManualJournalID
parameters.description: Unique identifier for a ManualJournal

parameters.description: The mime type of the attachment file you are retrieving i.e image/jpg, application/pdf

200.description: Success - return response of attachment for Manual Journal as binary data

post.summary: Allows you to update a specified Attachment on ManualJournal by file name

parameters.name: ManualJournalID
parameters.description: Unique identifier for a ManualJournal

parameters.name: FileName
parameters.description: The name of the file being attached to a ManualJournal

200.description: Success - return response of type Attachments array with an update Attachment for a ManualJournals

requestBody.description: Byte array of file in body of request

put.summary: Allows you to create a specified Attachment on ManualJournal by file name

parameters.name: FileName

400Error.description: A failed request due to validation error

Code.description: Customer defined alpha numeric account code e.g 200 or SALES (max length = 10)

AccountID.description: The Xero identifier for an account – specified as a string following  the endpoint name   e.g. /297c2dc5-cc47-4afd-8ec8-74990b8761e9

BankAccountNumber.description: For bank accounts only (Account Type BANK)

Status.description: Accounts with a status of ACTIVE can be updated to ARCHIVED. See Account Status Codes

Description.description: Description of the Account. Valid for all types of accounts except bank accounts (max length = 4000)

BankAccountType.description: For bank accounts only. See Bank Account types

EnablePaymentsToAccount.description: Boolean – describes whether account can have payments applied to it

ShowInExpenseClaims.description: Boolean – describes whether account code is available for use with expense claims

SystemAccount.description: If this is a system account then this element is returned. See System Account types. Note that non-system accounts may have this element set as either “” or null.

HasAttachments.description: boolean to indicate if an account has an attachment (read only)

ValidationErrors.description: Displays array of validation error messages from the API

Url.description: URL to the file on xero.com

IncludeOnline.description: Include the file with the online invoice

IsReconciled.description: Boolean to show if transaction is reconciled

Reference.description: Reference for the transaction. Only supported for SPEND and RECEIVE transactions.

CurrencyRate.description: Exchange rate to base currency when money is spent or received. e.g.0.7500 Only used for bank transactions in non base currency. If this isn’t specified for non base currency accounts then either the user-defined rate (preference) or the XE.com day rate will be used. Setting currency is only supported on overpayments.

Url.description: URL link to a source document – shown as “Go to App Name”

Status.description: See Bank Transaction Status Codes

SubTotal.description: Total of bank transaction excluding taxes

Total.description: Total of bank transaction tax inclusive

BankTransactionID.description: Xero generated unique identifier for bank transaction

PrepaymentID.description: Xero generated unique identifier for a Prepayment. This will be returned on BankTransactions with a Type of SPEND-PREPAYMENT or RECEIVE-PREPAYMENT

OverpaymentID.description: Xero generated unique identifier for an Overpayment. This will be returned on BankTransactions with a Type of SPEND-OVERPAYMENT or RECEIVE-OVERPAYMENT

HasAttachments.description: Boolean to indicate if a bank transaction has an attachment

StatusAttributeString.description: A string to indicate if a invoice status

ValidationErrors.description: Displays array of validation error messages from the API

LineAmountTypes.description: Line amounts are exclusive of tax by default if you don’t specify this element. See Line Amount Types

Description.description: Description needs to be at least 1 char long. A line item with just a description (i.e no unit amount or quantity) can be created by specifying just a <Description> element that contains at least 1 character

TaxAmount.description: The tax amount is auto calculated as a percentage of the line amount (see below) based on the tax rate. This value can be overriden if the calculated <TaxAmount> is not correct.

LineAmount.description: If you wish to omit either of the <Quantity> or <UnitAmount> you can provide a LineAmount and Xero will calculate the missing amount for you. The line amount reflects the discounted price if a DiscountRate has been used . i.e LineAmount = Quantity * Unit Amount * ((100 – DiscountRate)/100)

Tracking.description: Optional Tracking Category – see Tracking.  Any LineItem can have a  maximum of 2 <TrackingCategory> elements.

DiscountRate.description: Percentage discount being applied to a line item (only supported on  ACCREC invoices – ACC PAY invoices and credit notes in Xero do not support discounts

RepeatingInvoiceID.description: The Xero identifier for a Repeating Invoicee.g. 297c2dc5-cc47-4afd-8ec8-74990b8761e9

TrackingCategoryID.description: The Xero identifier for a tracking category

Name.description: The name of the tracking category

BankTransferID.description: The identifier of the Bank Transfer

FromBankTransactionID.description: The Bank Transaction ID for the source account

ToBankTransactionID.description: The Bank Transaction ID for the destination account

HasAttachments.description: Boolean to indicate if a Bank Transfer has an attachment

CreatedDateUTC.description: UTC timestamp of creation date of bank transfer

ValidationErrors.description: Displays array of validation error messages from the API

Reference.description: (NZ Only) Optional references for the batch payment transaction. It will also show with the batch payment transaction in the bank reconciliation Find & Match screen. Depending on your individual bank, the detail may also show on the bank statement you import into Xero.

Particulars.description: (NZ Only) Optional references for the batch payment transaction. It will also show with the batch payment transaction in the bank reconciliation Find & Match screen. Depending on your individual bank, the detail may also show on the bank statement you import into Xero.

Code.description: (NZ Only) Optional references for the batch payment transaction. It will also show with the batch payment transaction in the bank reconciliation Find & Match screen. Depending on your individual bank, the detail may also show on the bank statement you import into Xero.

Details.description: (Non-NZ Only) These details are sent to the org’s bank as a reference for the batch payment transaction. They will also show with the batch payment transaction in the bank reconciliation Find & Match screen. Depending on your individual bank, the detail may also show on the bank statement imported into Xero. Maximum field length = 18

Narrative.description: (UK Only) Only shows on the statement line in Xero. Max length =18

Type.description: PAYBATCH for bill payments or RECBATCH for sales invoice payments (read-only)

TotalAmount.description: The total of the payments that make up the batch (read-only)

UpdatedDateUTC.description: UTC timestamp of last update to the payment

IsReconciled.description: Booelan that tells you if the batch payment has been reconciled (read-only)

BankAccountName.description: Name of bank for use with Batch Payments

Details.description: (Non-NZ Only) These details are sent to the org’s bank as a reference for the batch payment transaction. They will also show with the batch payment transaction in the bank reconciliation Find & Match screen. Depending on your individual bank, the detail may also show on the bank statement imported into Xero. Maximum field length = 18

Code.description: (NZ Only) Optional references for the batch payment transaction. It will also show with the batch payment transaction in the bank reconciliation Find & Match screen. Depending on your individual bank, the detail may also show on the bank statement you import into Xero.

Reference.description: (NZ Only) Optional references for the batch payment transaction. It will also show with the batch payment transaction in the bank reconciliation Find & Match screen. Depending on your individual bank, the detail may also show on the bank statement you import into Xero.

SortOrder.description: Integer – ranked order of branding theme. The default branding theme has a value of 0

PayNowText.description: The text displayed on the Pay Now button in Xero Online Invoicing. If this is not set it will default to Pay by credit card

PaymentServiceType.description: This will always be CUSTOM for payment services created via the API.

ValidationErrors.description: Displays array of validation error messages from the API

ContactNumber.description: This can be updated via the API only i.e. This field is read only on the Xero contact screen, used to identify contacts in external systems (max length = 50). If the Contact Number is used, this is displayed as Contact Code in the Contacts UI in Xero.

AccountNumber.description: A user defined account number. This can be updated via the API and the Xero UI (max length = 50)

ContactStatus.description: Current status of a contact – see contact status types

FirstName.description: First name of contact person (max length = 255)

LastName.description: Last name of contact person (max length = 255)

EmailAddress.description: Email address of contact person (umlauts not supported) (max length  = 255)

TaxNumber.description: Tax number of contact – this is also known as the ABN (Australia), GST Number (New Zealand), VAT Number (UK) or Tax ID Number (US and global) in the Xero UI depending on which regionalized version of Xero you are using (max length = 50)

Addresses.description: Store certain address types for a contact – see address types

Phones.description: Store certain phone types for a contact – see phone types

IsSupplier.description: true or false – Boolean that describes if a contact that has any AP  invoices entered against them. Cannot be set via PUT or POST – it is automatically set when an accounts payable invoice is generated against this contact.

IsCustomer.description: true or false – Boolean that describes if a contact has any AR invoices entered against them. Cannot be set via PUT or POST – it is automatically set when an accounts receivable invoice is generated against this contact.

SalesDefaultAccountCode.description: The default sales account code for contacts

PurchasesDefaultAccountCode.description: The default purchases account code for contacts

SalesTrackingCategories.description: The default sales tracking categories for contacts

PurchasesTrackingCategories.description: The default purchases tracking categories for contacts

TrackingCategoryOption.description: The name of the Tracking Option assigned to the contact under SalesTrackingCategories and PurchasesTrackingCategories

UpdatedDateUTC.description: UTC timestamp of last update to contact

ContactGroups.description: Displays which contact groups a contact is included in

Discount.description: The default discount rate for the contact (read only)

Attachments.description: Displays array of attachments from the API

HasAttachments.description: A boolean to indicate if a contact has an attachment

ValidationErrors.description: Displays validation errors returned from the API

HasValidationErrors.description: A boolean to indicate if a contact has an validation errors

Balances.description: The raw AccountsReceivable(sales invoices) and AccountsPayable(bills) outstanding and overdue amounts, not converted to base currency (read only)

CISEnabled.description: Boolean that describes if the contact is a CIS Subcontractor

Rate.description: CIS Deduction rate for the contact if he is a subcontractor. If the contact is not CISEnabled, then the rate is not returned

CISSubContractorEnabled.description: true or false - Boolean that describes if the organisation is a CIS SubContractor

Rate.description: CIS Deduction rate for the organisation

IncludeInEmails.description: boolean to indicate whether contact should be included on emails with invoices etc.

Name.description: The Name of the contact group. Required when creating a new contact  group

Status.description: The Status of a contact group. To delete a contact group update the status to DELETED. Only contact groups with a status of ACTIVE are returned on GETs.

ContactGroupID.description: The Xero identifier for an contact group – specified as a string following the endpoint name. e.g. /297c2dc5-cc47-4afd-8ec8-74990b8761e9

Contacts.description: The ContactID and Name of Contacts in a contact group. Returned on GETs when the ContactGroupID is supplied in the URL.

LastName.description: Last name of an employee (max length = 255)

SourceTransactionID.description: Filter by the SourceTransactionID. Get all the linked transactions created from a particular ACCPAY invoice

SourceLineItemID.description: The line item identifier from the source transaction.

ContactID.description: Filter by the combination of ContactID and Status. Get all the linked transactions that have been assigned to a particular customer and have a particular status e.g. GET /LinkedTransactions?ContactID=4bb34b03-3378-4bb2-a0ed-6345abf3224e&Status=APPROVED.

TargetTransactionID.description: Filter by the TargetTransactionID. Get all the linked transactions  allocated to a particular ACCREC invoice

TargetLineItemID.description: The line item identifier from the target transaction. It is possible  to link multiple billable expenses to the same TargetLineItemID.

LinkedTransactionID.description: The Xero identifier for an Linked Transaction e.g. /LinkedTransactions/297c2dc5-cc47-4afd-8ec8-74990b8761e9

Status.description: Filter by the combination of ContactID and Status. Get all the linked transactions that have been assigned to a particular customer and have a particular status e.g. GET /LinkedTransactions?ContactID=4bb34b03-3378-4bb2-a0ed-6345abf3224e&Status=APPROVED.

Type.description: This will always be BILLABLEEXPENSE. More types may be added in future.

UpdatedDateUTC.description: The last modified date in UTC format

SourceTransactionTypeCode.description: The Type of the source tranasction. This will be ACCPAY if the linked transaction was created from an invoice and SPEND if it was created from a bank transaction.

ValidationErrors.description: Displays array of validation error messages from the API

Status.description: See Manual Journal Status Codes

Url.description: Url link to a source document – shown as “Go to [appName]” in the Xero app

ShowOnCashBasisReports.description: Boolean – default is true if not specified

HasAttachments.description: Boolean to indicate if a manual journal has an attachment

ManualJournalID.description: The Xero identifier for a Manual Journal

Warnings.description: Displays array of warning messages from the API

ValidationErrors.description: Displays array of validation error messages from the API

Attachments.description: Displays array of attachments from the API

LineAmount.description: total for line. Debits are positive, credits are negative value

Description.example: Coded incorrectly Office Equipment should be Computer Equipment

Tracking.description: Optional Tracking Category – see Tracking. Any JournalLine can have a maximum of 2 <TrackingCategory> elements.

TaxAmount.description: The calculated tax amount based on the TaxType and LineAmount

APIKey.description: Display a unique key used for Xero-to-Xero transactions

Name.description: Display name of organisation shown in Xero

PaysTax.description: Boolean to describe if organisation is registered with a local tax authority i.e. true, false

IsDemoCompany.description: Boolean to describe if organisation is a demo company.

OrganisationStatus.description: Will be set to ACTIVE if you can connect to organisation via the Xero API

RegistrationNumber.description: Shows for New Zealand, Australian and UK organisations

TaxNumber.description: Shown if set. Displays in the Xero UI as Tax File Number (AU), GST Number (NZ), VAT Number (UK) and Tax ID Number (US & Global).

SalesTaxBasis.description: The accounting basis used for tax returns. See Sales Tax Basis

SalesTaxPeriod.description: The frequency with which tax returns are processed. See Sales Tax Period

DefaultSalesTax.description: The default for LineAmountTypes on sales transactions

DefaultPurchasesTax.description: The default for LineAmountTypes on purchase transactions

PeriodLockDate.description: Shown if set. See lock dates

EndOfYearLockDate.description: Shown if set. See lock dates

CreatedDateUTC.description: Timestamp when the organisation was created in Xero

ShortCode.description: A unique identifier for the organisation. Potential uses.

Class.description: Organisation Classes describe which plan the Xero organisation is on (e.g. DEMO, TRIAL, PREMIUM)

Edition.description: BUSINESS or PARTNER. Partner edition organisations are sold exclusively through accounting partners and have restricted functionality (e.g. no access to invoicing)

LineOfBusiness.description: Description of business type as defined in Organisation settings

Addresses.description: Address details for organisation – see Addresses

Phones.description: Phones details for organisation – see Phones

ExternalLinks.description: Organisation profile links for popular services such as Facebook,Twitter, GooglePlus and LinkedIn. You can also add link to your website here. Shown if Organisation settings  is updated in Xero. See ExternalLinks below

Date.description: The date the overpayment is created YYYY-MM-DD

Status.description: See Overpayment Status Codes

SubTotal.description: The subtotal of the overpayment excluding taxes

TotalTax.description: The total tax on the overpayment

Total.description: The total of the overpayment (subtotal + total tax)

UpdatedDateUTC.description: UTC timestamp of last update to the overpayment

CurrencyRate.description: The currency rate for a multicurrency overpayment. If no rate is specified, the XE.com day rate is used

RemainingCredit.description: The remaining credit balance on the overpayment

HasAttachments.description: boolean to indicate if a overpayment has an attachment

InvoiceNumber.description: Number of invoice or credit note you are applying payment to e.g.INV-4003

CreditNoteNumber.description: Number of invoice or credit note you are applying payment to e.g. INV-4003

Code.description: Code of account you are using to make the payment e.g. 001 (note- not all accounts have a code value)

Date.description: Date the payment is being made (YYYY-MM-DD) e.g. 2009-09-06

CurrencyRate.description: Exchange rate when payment is received. Only used for non base currency invoices and credit notes e.g. 0.7500

Amount.description: The amount of the payment. Must be less than or equal to the outstanding amount owing on the invoice e.g. 200.00

Reference.description: An optional description for the payment e.g. Direct Debit

IsReconciled.description: An optional parameter for the payment. A boolean indicating whether you would like the payment to be created as reconciled when using PUT, or whether a payment has been reconciled when using GET

Status.description: The status of the payment.

UpdatedDateUTC.description: UTC timestamp of last update to the payment

PaymentID.description: The Xero identifier for an Payment e.g. 297c2dc5-cc47-4afd-8ec8-74990b8761e9

BankAccountNumber.description: The suppliers bank account number the payment is being made to

Particulars.description: The suppliers bank account number the payment is being made to

Details.description: The information to appear on the supplier's bank account

HasAccount.description: A boolean to indicate if a contact has an validation errors

HasValidationErrors.description: A boolean to indicate if a contact has an validation errors

ValidationErrors.description: Displays array of validation error messages from the API

Date.description: The date the prepayment is created YYYY-MM-DD

Status.description: See Prepayment Status Codes

SubTotal.description: The subtotal of the prepayment excluding taxes

TotalTax.description: The total tax on the prepayment

Total.description: The total of the prepayment(subtotal + total tax)

UpdatedDateUTC.description: UTC timestamp of last update to the prepayment

CurrencyRate.description: The currency rate for a multicurrency prepayment. If no rate is specified, the XE.com day rate is used

RemainingCredit.description: The remaining credit balance on the prepayment

HasAttachments.description: boolean to indicate if a prepayment has an attachment

Date.description: Date purchase order was issued – YYYY-MM-DD. If the Date element is not specified then it will default to the current date based on the timezone setting of the organisation

DeliveryDate.description: Date the goods are to be delivered – YYYY-MM-DD

PurchaseOrderNumber.description: Unique alpha numeric code identifying purchase order (when missing will auto-generate from your Organisation Invoice Settings)

Status.description: See Purchase Order Status Codes

SentToContact.description: Boolean to set whether the purchase order should be marked as “sent”. This can be set only on purchase orders that have been approved or billed

DeliveryAddress.description: The address the goods are to be delivered to

AttentionTo.description: The person that the delivery is going to

Telephone.description: The phone number for the person accepting the delivery

DeliveryInstructions.description: A free text feild for instructions (500 characters max)

ExpectedArrivalDate.description: The date the goods are expected to arrive.

PurchaseOrderID.description: Xero generated unique identifier for purchase order

CurrencyRate.description: The currency rate for a multicurrency purchase order. As no rate can  be specified, the XE.com day rate is used.

SubTotal.description: Total of purchase order excluding taxes

Total.description: Total of Purchase Order tax inclusive (i.e. SubTotal + TotalTax)

TotalDiscount.description: Total of discounts applied on the purchase order line items

HasAttachments.description: boolean to indicate if a purchase order has an attachment

StatusAttributeString.description: A string to indicate if a invoice status

ValidationErrors.description: Displays array of validation error messages from the API

Warnings.description: Displays array of warning messages from the API

Attachments.description: Displays array of attachments from the API

Total.description: Total of receipt tax inclusive (i.e. SubTotal + TotalTax)

ReceiptID.description: Xero generated unique identifier for receipt

Status.description: Current status of receipt – see status types

ReceiptNumber.description: Xero generated sequence number for receipt in current claim for a given user

HasAttachments.description: boolean to indicate if a receipt has an attachment

Url.description: URL link to a source document – shown as “Go to [appName]” in the Xero app

ValidationErrors.description: Displays array of validation error messages from the API

Attachments.description: Displays array of attachments from the API

Status.description: One of the following - DRAFT or AUTHORISED – See Invoice Status Codes

Total.description: Total of Invoice tax inclusive (i.e. SubTotal + TotalTax)

RepeatingInvoiceID.description: Xero generated unique identifier for repeating invoice template

ID.description: Xero generated unique identifier for repeating invoice template

HasAttachments.description: boolean to indicate if an invoice has an attachment

Attachments.description: Displays array of attachments from the API

ReportTitles.description: Report titles array (3 to 4 strings with the report name, orgnisation name and time frame of report)

Period.description: Integer used with the unit e.g. 1 (every 1 week), 2 (every 2 months)

Unit.description: One of the following - WEEKLY or MONTHLY

DueDate.description: Integer used with due date type e.g 20 (of following month), 31 (of current month)

StartDate.description: Date the first invoice of the current version of the repeating schedule was generated (changes when repeating invoice is edited)

NextScheduledDate.description: The calendar date of the next invoice in the schedule to be generated

EndDate.description: Invoice end date – only returned if the template has an end date set

TaxType.description: See Tax Types – can only be used on update calls

Status.description: See Status Codes

CanApplyToAssets.description: Boolean to describe if tax rate can be used for asset accounts i.e.  true,false

CanApplyToEquity.description: Boolean to describe if tax rate can be used for equity accounts i.e true,false

CanApplyToExpenses.description: Boolean to describe if tax rate can be used for expense accounts  i.e. true,false

CanApplyToLiabilities.description: Boolean to describe if tax rate can be used for liability accounts  i.e. true,false

CanApplyToRevenue.description: Boolean to describe if tax rate can be used for revenue accounts i.e. true,false

IsCompound.description: Boolean to describe if Tax rate is compounded.

IsNonRecoverable.description: Boolean to describe if tax rate is non-recoverable. Non-recoverable rates are only applicable to Canadian organisations

TrackingCategoryID.description: The Xero identifier for a tracking category e.g. 297c2dc5-cc47-4afd-8ec8-74990b8761e9

TrackingOptionID.description: The Xero identifier for a tracking option e.g. dc54c220-0140-495a-b925-3246adc0075f

Name.description: The name of the tracking category e.g. Department, Region (max length = 100)

Option.description: The option name of the tracking option e.g. East, West (max length = 100)

Status.description: The status of a tracking category

TrackingOptionID.description: The Xero identifier for a tracking optione.g. ae777a87-5ef3-4fa0-a4f0-d10e1f13073a

Name.description: The name of the tracking option e.g. Marketing, East (max length = 50)

Status.description: The status of a tracking option

UpdatedDateUTC.description: Timestamp of last change to user

IsSubscriber.description: Boolean to indicate if user is the subscriber

OrganisationRole.description: User role that defines permissions in Xero and via API (READONLY, INVOICEONLY, STANDARD, FINANCIALADVISER, etc)

Elements.description: Array of Elements of validation Error
